entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 30 April 2023
